input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Age has a direct effect on hospital costs and freckles. Hospital costs has a direct effect on freckles. Method 1: We look directly at how hospital costs correlates with freckles in general. Method 2: We look at this correlation case by case according to age. To understand how hospital costs affects freckles, is it more correct to use the Method 1 than Method 2?
